name: Adventure On Scooters (Nighttime suggested)
description: When in Saigon, do as the Saigonese do, right? Yes, we offers one of the unique services in Ho Chi Minh City - experiences on two wheels to explore the whole famous and local areas instead of walking around the center of the city, and taste most of famous Vietnamese foods from local stores instead of luxury restaurants. Once you sit on the back of our scooters you will love us more for our reliable driving skill. We want to be more your friends than tourists to makes you want to approach more closely to the Vietnamese culture and our daily lives.
